channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Parked on the parent and child spot without being with a child/baby, 12th December
item.description:
We came to the store this evening, we have a baby of 7months, parking spots are hard to find, and mostly of them are used by the people without, in front of us it was a car with a couple who pParked on the parent and child parking spot without being with a child/baby. I asked them if they have a child, so we can change spots since we had our 7 months old in the car.. they walk off and then started to shout and swearing.. Please check the cameras and do something.. as there are so many parents left without a spot.. and is a real struggle... Regards, Bogdan Andrei

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cygnet View, West Thurrock, South Ockendon
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of about five big garbage bags and someone’s adding to them outside Mansfield Court on the pavement, 12th December
item.description:
This week somebody has been fly tipping big bags of rubbish. They have started with about two but now about six there. It’s on the pavement opposite Mansfield Court and this will create a hazard because of foxes and rats who may break up in the bags.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing Bin Misuse at 5–16 Oswald Mead, 12th December
item.description:
The communal bins for flats 5–16 Oswald Mead are constantly overflowing because surrounding households are using them, even though they have their own bins outside their homes. This is causing excessive waste, mess, and hygiene issues for the residents.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oswalds Mead, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Pothole in Morrisons car park, 12th December
item.description:
There are two large Potholes in Morrison's car park one at the front car park and the second one on the road leading to the back car park. These I understand have already been reported to you by Morrison's Supermarket as well as members of the public. These need to be repaired ASAP before an accident happens
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springfield Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Still pitch black in Peckham Rye Station Arcade, 12th December
item.description:
This is a complete joke now. And you expect people to not feel like they may be murdered when visiting Peckham?? Turn on the lights before something serious actually happens here. Absolutely shocking dereliction of duty by the council. If you claim this isn't your building, stop trying to take the credit for the building refurbishment works and tell the owner to turn on the lights now!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 78, Rye Lane, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Milman rd between Harvist and Kempe Rd, 12th December
item.description:
Thanks for sending someone to sweep the footpaths. Unfortunately they just swept all the leaves onto the road instead of picking them up, so as soon as it’s windy, it will end up back on the footpath.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Milman Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
